[\[56b.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral 
[\[56b.5\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar 
[\[56b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan 
[\[56b.7\]]rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mngon 
[\[57a.2\]]par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[57a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang nam yang bral 
[\[57a.4\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/_de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[57a.5\]]bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/_me tog 
[\[57a.6\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba/_
[\[57a.7\]]des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dong ste/_de dag gis lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa rmyong zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[57b.2\]]theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul bar ta ni na spyod par 'gyur te/_de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[57b.3\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_
[\[57b.4\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod 
[\[57b.5\]]par byed par 'gyur te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dong ste/_de dag gis lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol 
[\[57b.6\]]tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_
[\[57b.7\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar ta ni nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]na spyod par 'gyur te/_de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 
[\[58a.2\]]'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs 
[\[58a.3\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed par 'gyur te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dong ste/_de dag gis lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum 
[\[58a.4\]]tshogs pa myong zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_
[\[58a.5\]]phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[58a.6\]]bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang /_byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/_lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin 
[\[58a.7\]]gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dar la bab pa'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_chos de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[58b.2\]]kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing bris nas kyang /_me tog 
[\[58b.3\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi 
[\[58b.4\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dong ste/_de dag lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de 
[\[58b.5\]]dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[58b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
[\[58b.7\]]gyis gzigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsten no/_/bsngags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[59a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/_/rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/_/bstod

[\[59a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/_/

[\[59a.7\]]gis brjod do/_/bstod do/_/bsngags so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i de 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag 
[\[59b.2\]]gis brjod do/_/bstod do/_/bsngags so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i

[\[59b.7\]]'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/_/bstod do/_/bsngags so/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[60b.2\]]'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/_de la sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/_thos nas 
[\[60b.3\]]kyang mos par 'gyur ro/_/mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[60b.4\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang /_mos par byas nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed cing 
[\[60b.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[60b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[60b.7\]]zab mo 'di nyan cing /_thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang /_mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid cing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni

[\[62b.6\]]'das de dag gis kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de/_de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]par bzhag par 'gyur te/_de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_sdig to la mos pa dang /_sdig to'i spyod pa can 
[\[63a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_dga' zhing dang ba 
[\[63a.3\]]dang nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad 
[\[63a.4\]]du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag

[\[63a.6\]]ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te/_ngas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[63a.7\]]rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o/_/
[\[63b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs 
[\[63b.3\]]te rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla 
[\[63b.4\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_yang dag par skul bar 'gyur/_yang dag par gzeng stod par 'gyur/_yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[63b.5\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/_de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur 
[\[63b.6\]]ro/_/sbyin pa rlabs po che btang zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/_rnam par smyin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag_/rnam par 
[\[63b.7\]]smyin pa rlabs chen po yongs su bzung nas/_sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smyin pa rlabs po che las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar phyi 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang /_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs 
[\[64a.2\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dge la rten par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[64a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na 
[\[64a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par gzeng stod par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[64a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/_chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/de bzhin nyid dang 
[\[64a.6\]]chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/_'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su 
[\[64a.7\]]mkhyen to/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[64b.2\]]kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[64b.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[64b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang /_
[\[64b.5\]]yongs su tshol ba las/_la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/_la las ni thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/_rigs 
[\[64b.6\]]kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol 
[\[64b.7\]]tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas 
[\[65a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]skabs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing /_yang dag par skul ba dang /_yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[65a.3\]]dga' bar byed pa dang /_'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[65a.4\]]yongs su dag par ma byas/_sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag 
[\[65a.5\]]las brtson 'grus nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_
[\[65a.6\]]bam po lnga pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[65a.7\]]tu zhugs pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/_sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]kyi bu mo bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/_de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/_
[\[65b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_bsam 
[\[65b.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[65b.5\]]pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[65b.6\]]bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shin tu 
[\[65b.7\]]myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/_de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[66a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed na/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/_
[\[66a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su 
[\[66a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[66a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/sems g.yeng zhing 'dri na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig 
[\[66a.6\]]gi don [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes par 'dri na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66a.7\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing lung 'bog na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/glal zhing kha ton byed dam/_
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_ston pa dang /_glal zhing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun 
[\[66b.2\]]dgod cing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[66b.3\]]phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[66b.4\]]gzhan yang sems g.yeng pas 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/
[\[66b.5\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[66b.6\]]pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las 
[\[66b.7\]]langs te 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro [{]myi [,]mi [}]myong par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[67a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lam spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma 
[\[67a.3\]]bstan to zhes/_ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[67a.4\]]phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma chud pa ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[67a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]bstan te/_de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo /_/bdag gi rmying yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[67a.6\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags/_
[\[67a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rjod de/_de la bdag gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang 'di las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung /_bdag gang du skyes 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]pa'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]'di yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo zhes/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyan to snyam byed cing /_'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/_sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa 
[\[67b.2\]]ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgrub 
[\[67b.3\]]pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/_des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de nyid yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo 
[\[67b.4\]]ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 
[\[67b.5\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/_'di ltar 
[\[67b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[67b.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams te/_de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'bras bu thob pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur gyi/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ste/_
[\[68a.2\]]rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgrub pa'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[68a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[68a.4\]]pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_khyi la la zhig jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te las 
[\[68a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/_rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[68a.6\]]cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brtan par sems pa 'byung ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[68a.7\]]dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas khe dang 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[68b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]la la zhig glang po che 'dod la des glang po che rnyed nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[68b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag bcol bar sems pa 
[\[68b.4\]]de dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/_ba lang gi rjes 
[\[68b.5\]]btsal bar sems shing /_des ba la glang gi rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam snyam na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_
[\[68b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi 
[\[68b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo thos shing rnyed kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ltar rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_phywa mkhan nam phywa mkhan gyi slob mas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa 
[\[69a.2\]]zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing /_nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang las tshad blang bar sems na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang 
[\[69a.3\]]gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/_de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[69a.4\]]phywa mkhan nam/_phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/_mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[69a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor 
[\[69a.6\]]zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 
[\[69a.7\]]dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/_des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/_'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur 
[\[69b.2\]]ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang /_dbyibs kyis ji 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te/_'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang 
[\[69b.3\]]tshul dang mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni 
[\[69b.4\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed 
[\[69b.5\]]kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bcol bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_
[\[69b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[69b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing /_des kha 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/_drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar sems na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[70a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[70a.3\]]phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems 
[\[70a.4\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[70a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnyed nas/_nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[70a.6\]]du sems/_skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg 
[\[70a.7\]]pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]dag las/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/_
[\[70b.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang 
[\[70b.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_spobs pa mang po gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ltar gzugs 
[\[70b.4\]]kyi spobs pa dang /_sgra'i spobs pa dang /_dri'i spobs pa dang /_ro'i spobs pa dang /_reg gi spobs ba dang /_chos kyi spobs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang /_bzod pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang /_shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /_
[\[70b.6\]]lung dpog pa dang /_kha ton bya bi spobs pa dang /_rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spongs pa dang /_yang dag par spong pa'i spobs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang /_dbang po'i 
[\[70b.7\]]spobs pa dang /_stobs kyi spobs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang /_lam gyi stobs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang /_snyoms 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[71a.2\]]spobs pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stobs pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[71a.3\]]spobs pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_tshes thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[71a.4\]]spobs pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[71a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs 
[\[71a.6\]]pa dang /_stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i rig pa'i spobs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 
[\[71a.7\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par byang ba'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[71b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 
[\[71b.3\]]'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni shes 
[\[71b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/_

[\[71b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[71b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/

[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[73a.2\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas dngos po med pa bri bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[73a.3\]]mo 'di dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar 'du shes na/_de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[73a.4\]]'di yi ger bris nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[73a.5\]]tu phyin pa ni yi ge mi mchis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[73a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyi yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'du byed 
[\[73a.7\]]ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par 
[\[73b.2\]]shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[73b.3\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni 
[\[73b.4\]]yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[73b.5\]]tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma 
[\[73b.6\]]mchis pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rlung gi khams ni yi 
[\[73b.7\]]ge ma mchis pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mchis pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[74a.2\]]len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge 
[\[74a.3\]]ma mchis pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'dus ma byas 
[\[74a.4\]]stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rang bzhin 
[\[74a.5\]]stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[74a.6\]]nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams 
[\[74a.7\]]ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[74b.2\]]pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[74b.3\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma 
[\[74b.4\]]mchis pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig par rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[74b.5\]]thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[74b.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/_yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing /_yi ge 
[\[74b.7\]]ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags 
[\[75a.2\]]par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par 
[\[75a.3\]]chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong 
[\[75a.4\]]pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[75a.5\]]yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[75a.6\]]nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid 
[\[75a.7\]]pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa 
[\[75b.2\]]dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la 
[\[75b.3\]]mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis 
[\[75b.4\]]pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la 
[\[75b.5\]]mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[75b.6\]]yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i 
[\[75b.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la 
[\[76a.2\]]mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma 
[\[76a.3\]]mchis pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par 
[\[76a.4\]]chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/_de yang byang chub 
[\[76a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs 
[\[76a.6\]]kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_zhu ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_
[\[76a.7\]]sgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_zhu ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/_grong gi 
[\[76b.2\]]yid la bya ba dang /_grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang /_khams kyi yid la bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang /_khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang /_bla ma dang /_mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang /_ma dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[76b.3\]]bya ba dang /_pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_phyag dar 
[\[76b.4\]]ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_sprul 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skyen/_rab 'byor 
[\[76b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 
[\[76b.6\]]'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[76b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/_khe dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_chos gos dang zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang po byung la byang chub sems 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_de dag gi ro myong bar 
[\[77a.2\]]byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[77a.3\]]byed pa'i tshe/_bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_
[\[77a.4\]]kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[77a.5\]]rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[77a.6\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed 
[\[77a.7\]]do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pa dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]nas spang bar sems te/_de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa yang rgya cher bstan te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[77b.2\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/_
[\[77b.3\]]rab 'byor de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu gcig go/_//
[\[77b.4\]]/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po drug pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa nyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[77b.5\]]bya bar dga' la chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri 
[\[77b.6\]]ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya bar phyi shol [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la/_chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[77b.7\]]gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad lhur len la 
[\[78a.2\]]chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yeng ba sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/_khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/_rab 'byor de 
[\[78a.3\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[78a.4\]]gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yeng ba/_sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/_khe dang bkur stis 
[\[78a.5\]]'jigs la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/_khe dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing /_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad lhur len na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi 
[\[78a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos 
[\[78a.7\]]smra ba ni dgon pa pa/_bsod snyoms pa/_phyag dar khrod pa/_zas phyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]len pa/_stan gcig pa/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/_dur khrod pa/_bla gab [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_shing drung pa/_cog pu pa/_gzhi ji bzhin pa/_chos gos 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]gsum par gyur la/_chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms pa ma yin/_phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/_zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/_stan gcig pa ma yin/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/_dur khrod pa ma yin/_bla gab med 
[\[78b.2\]]pa ma yin/_shing drung pa ma yin/_cog pu pa ma yin/_gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/_chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan 
[\[78b.3\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa/_bsod snyoms pa/_phyag dar khrod pa/_zas phyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]len pa/_stan gcig pa/_
[\[78b.4\]]zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/_dur khrod pa/_bla gab [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_shing drung pa/_cog pu pa/_gzhi ci bzhin pa/_chos gos gsum par gyur la/_chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms pa ma yin/_phyag dar 
[\[78b.5\]]khod pa ma yin/_zas phyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]len pa ma yin/_stan gcig pa ma yin/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/_dur khrod pa ma yin/_bla gab [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin/_shing drung pa ma yin/_cog pu pa ma yin/_gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/_chos 
[\[78b.6\]]gos gsum pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms len pa ma yin na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[78b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/_lung 'bog par 'dod/_kha ton byed par 'dod la/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/_tshul khrims ngan pa can/_sdig to'i chos can zhig ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_lung 'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_kha ton byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de 
[\[79a.2\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[79a.3\]]gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/_lung 'bogs par 'dod/_kha ton bya bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni ma dad na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[79a.4\]]zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/_bdog pa 
[\[79a.5\]]thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa 
[\[79a.6\]]dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems 
[\[79a.7\]]la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba la gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo

[\[79b.5\]]pa tsam gyis shes la/_chos smra ba ni dkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[79b.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_
[\[79b.7\]]'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_

[\[80a.1\]]lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan

[\[80a.4\]]pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/_chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad 
[\[80a.5\]]pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes na/_
[\[80a.6\]]rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/

[\[81a.1\]]smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[81a.3\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_klag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_lung 'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_kha ton bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_mnyan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa

[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las

[\[81b.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_la la zhig der 'ongs te/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]snyan pa brjod/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul gyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]snyan pa brjod cing /_sems can dmyal

[\[81b.7\]]mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/_khyod yun ring por 'khor ba ni 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[82a.2\]]gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/_la la zhig der 'ongs te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[82a.3\]]ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_gzhan 
[\[82a.4\]]'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
