[\[82a.7\]]rjod/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rjod/_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs par rjod/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_
[\[82b.2\]{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing /_'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o/_/gzugs kyi khams 
[\[82b.3\]]ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/_de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[82b.4\]]chos can zad pa'i chos can/_'jig pa'i chos can/_skye ba'i chos can/_'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/_khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[82b.5\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/_'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig_/phyin chad 'khor ba nam 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[82b.6\]]'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/_zla 
[\[82b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/_zla [{]myed [,]med [}]cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/_/
[\[83a.2\]]rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[83a.3\]]'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/_zla [{]myed [,]med [}]cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu 
[\[83a.4\]]rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/_zla [{]myed [,]med [}]cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/_chos smra ba ni tshogs 
[\[83a.5\]]yongs su sdud na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las 
[\[83a.6\]]su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du/_su nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'drir sbyin no zhes zer la/_chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]'brang na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[83a.7\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[83b.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/_klog tu gzhug par 'dod/_lung 
[\[83b.3\]]'bog par 'dod/_kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni zang zing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i 
[\[83b.4\]]rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar 'dod/_klog par 
[\[83b.5\]]'dod/_lung 'bog par 'dod/_kha ton bya bar 'dod/_sgom par 'dod/_nyan par 'dod la chos smra ba ni zang zing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_'drir gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_klog tu gzhug par 
[\[83b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_lung 'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_kha ton byed du gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_sgom du gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_nyan du gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa 
[\[83b.7\]]dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang 
[\[84a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'a dod la/_chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab 
[\[84a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na 
[\[84a.4\]]zas dkon pa dang /_chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa 'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan 
[\[84a.5\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang /_chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos smra ba 
[\[84a.6\]]ni der 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[84a.7\]]bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang /_chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na/_des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]tu song ste ji rung /_legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig_/zas thob ma thob dang bsod [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/_de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang /_thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[84b.2\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/_'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/_spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed 
[\[84b.3\]]pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /_rngon pa'i 
[\[84b.4\]]'jigs pa dang /_gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /_sprul gyi 'jigs pa dang /_'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/_chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don tu chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/_dge slong 
[\[84b.5\]]chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /_rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /_sprul gyi 'jigs pa 
[\[84b.6\]]dang /_'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der song ste/_ci rung zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]bstan pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_klog tu gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_
[\[84b.7\]]lung 'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_kha ton byed du gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod/_nyan du gzhug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod par gyur la/_de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag thos nas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dga' zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/_dge slong 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[85a.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par 'gyur te/_de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas bsod snyoms gtong 
[\[85a.3\]]ba'i grong de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing /_der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa phyir zlog cing /_tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong ba lta dgos te/_bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes 
[\[85a.4\]]nas/_des chos nyan pa de dag phyir bzlog pa'i phyir 'dod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems 
[\[85a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba 
[\[85a.6\]]dang /_lung 'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_kha ton byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom 
[\[85a.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing /_ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_lung 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]'bog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_kha ton bgyid par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can 
[\[85b.2\]]dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/_ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dbyen byed cing zlog 
[\[85b.3\]]la mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed do/_/rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag the tsom du gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[85b.4\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri bar 'gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]klog par 'gyur/_lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bog par 'gyur/_kha ton [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par 'gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgom par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[85b.5\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa 'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to 
[\[85b.6\]]can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni 
[\[85b.7\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/_des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[86a.2\]]byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/_bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi 
[\[86a.3\]]las mang du 'byung ste/_bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o/_/rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[86a.4\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/_spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha 
[\[86a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_rab 'byor 
[\[86a.6\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/_de dag 
[\[86a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/_rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus 
[\[86b.2\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[86b.3\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[86b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[86b.5\]]sgom tshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang gis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 
[\[86b.6\]]thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar bsnyen te/_de yang de la dga' ba bskyed na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[86b.7\]]zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/_
[\[87a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa bskyed do/_/des mos pa bskyed nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[87a.3\]]'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs 
[\[87a.4\]]kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/_des de la 'dod pa skyed cing /_bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[87a.5\]]rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis 
[\[87a.6\]]kyang chos bstan par bya'o zhes de de la 'dod pa skyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[87a.7\]]byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/_byang chub 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[87b.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/des 
[\[87b.3\]]de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed 
[\[87b.4\]]pa dang /_sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[87b.5\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[87b.6\]]sgra [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dri med do/_/ro [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes 
[\[87b.7\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i

[\[95a.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la sangs rgyas 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[95b.2\]]bu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de 
[\[95b.3\]]la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas 
[\[95b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la dgra bcom pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub 
[\[95b.5\]]sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la rang byang chub [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[95b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang la bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[95b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha 
[\[96a.2\]]ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel 
[\[96a.3\]]dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog 
[\[96a.4\]]pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[96a.5\]]rab 'byar kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru 
[\[96a.6\]]dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[96a.7\]]'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/slar rgol 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang /_
[\[96b.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyi byin kyis brlabs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs 
[\[96b.3\]]kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgyu shin tu chung bar 
[\[96b.4\]]'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug go/_/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]klog/_lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bog_/kha ton [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgom/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid 
[\[96b.5\]]de/_gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la yang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[96b.6\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]klog_/lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bog/_kha ton [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgom/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_gzhan 'dri ba dang /_
[\[96b.7\]]klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bskyed pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa sha stag 'byung ste/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo 
[\[97a.2\]]zhan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]klog_/lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bog_/kha ton [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgom/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_gzhan 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[97a.3\]]lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug go/_/rab 
[\[97a.4\]]'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang /_rab 'byor 
[\[97a.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /_lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[97a.6\]]byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha la rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[97a.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_stong pa 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[97b.2\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rang 
[\[97b.3\]]bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[97b.4\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[97b.5\]]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_stobs 
[\[97b.6\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[97b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[98a.2\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[98a.3\]]stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[98a.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_
[\[98a.5\]]rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/_des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/_klog go/_/lung 'bog go_/kha ton byed do/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/_/
[\[98a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[98a.7\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi stong pa 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[98b.2\]]byed do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[98b.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[98b.4\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[98b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dbang po 
[\[98b.6\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gong du 
[\[98b.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[99a.2\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[99a.3\]]stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[99a.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[99a.5\]]byed do/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa 
[\[99a.6\]]dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[99a.7\]]mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_
[\[99b.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[99b.3\]]phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 
[\[99b.4\]]cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[99b.5\]]du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/_shes rab kyi 
[\[99b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[99b.7\]]'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[100a.2\]]dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[100a.3\]]'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin

[\[100a.5\]]ba dang /_klag pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/_/shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa gang ji 
[\[100a.6\]]snyed pa de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu 
[\[100a.7\]]brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]zhing /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir

[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /_lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu

[\[101a.7\]]nyi shu 'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_lnga bcu 'am/_brgya 'am/_stong zhig yod na/_de dag ni ma de ci nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing /_bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_bdag cag gi ma 'di 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]la ji ltar na bar chad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya/_bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba'i nyams [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya na ji ltar bya/_'di ni bdag cag skyed 
[\[101b.2\]]skyed pa ste/_srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do/_/de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo /_/lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo /_/lus la sha sbrang dang /_sbrang 
[\[101b.3\]]bu dang /_sbrul gyis gtse ba'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo /_/tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dud legs par bya bas phu dud byed do/_/de ltar bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed 
[\[101b.4\]]pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun tu rim gro byed cing /_sti stang dang /_bkur sti cher byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[103a.2\]]rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di yang ston ston pa'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs 
[\[103a.3\]]rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di 
[\[103a.4\]]las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di las byung ba

[\[103a.7\]]las byung ba ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa

[\[103b.1\]]stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni

[\[103b.5\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/

[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/'di las byung ba ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/'di las byung ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams so/_/'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so/_/'di

[\[104a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am

[\[104a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rab 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston 
[\[104b.2\]]pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha 
[\[104b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags/_'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[104b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed do/_/byams pa chen po 
[\[104b.5\]]bskyed do/_/snying rje chen po bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bskyed do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[104b.6\]]chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de/_rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig 
[\[104b.7\]]rten gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di 
[\[105a.2\]]dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/_rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/_skye zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/'gag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/kun nas nyon mongs shes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/rnam par byang zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/'phel zhes bya 
[\[105a.3\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/'grib ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/blang zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/dor zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/'das shes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/ma 'ongs shes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/da ltar byung zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[108a.7\]]ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ston par 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]byed pa ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no/_/

[\[109a\]]

[\[111b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can gang ji snyed cig gdags pas gdags su yod pa/_gzugs yod pa 'am gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'am 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'du shes yod pa 'am 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'am/_'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang ma yin pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag gis yang rung ste/_de dag

[\[112a.3\]]pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni chos nyid kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa chos nyid gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni chos gang la chos nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[112a.5\]]na/_sems bsdus pa dang spros pa lta smos kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]smos pa'i chos nyid des/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs

[\[112a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa mi zad pa'i rnam par ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zad pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi 
[\[112b.2\]]sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa 
[\[112b.3\]]dang spros pa ni 'gog pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni spong ba'i rnam 
[\[112b.4\]]par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zhi ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[112b.5\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[112b.6\]]rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de 
[\[112b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag 
[\[113a.2\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems shes 
[\[113a.3\]]bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin 
[\[113a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems shes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[113a.5\]]mkhyen pa lags/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems shes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems 
[\[113a.6\]]shes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[113a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_sems las byung 
[\[113b.2\]]ba'i chos rnams kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa 'am/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/_/

[\[113b.5\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang 
[\[113b.6\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[113b.7\]]mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/_'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]'grogs shing phrad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/

[\[114a.3\]]kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/_zhe sdang dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang

[\[114a.5\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/_sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/_gti mug dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems gnyis

[\[114a.7\]]'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/_sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di

[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems

[\[115a.3\]]gzigs so/_/'gro ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/'gag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/gnas pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems de la gang 'ong bar 'gyur

[\[115b\]]

[\[116b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang 'du ba dang bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du

[\[116b.5\]]shes pa la brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems de dag rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[116b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/

[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par 
[\[117a.2\]]shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/

[\[117a.4\]]shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs

[\[117a.6\]]don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[117a.7\]]ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa yang yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du

[\[117b.3\]]ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/lus de srog dang ldan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor

[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/_/de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/_/de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin

[\[122b.3\]]'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi ma yin te/_lha'i bu dag la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na/_ci de yang dag par sma bas yang dag par smra ba yin nam/_
[\[122b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/_nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom 
[\[122b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so/_/mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[122b.6\]]du gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[122b.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la bzhugs pas/_de bzhin 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par 
[\[123a.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas/_mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 
[\[123a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te/_de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[123a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad de/_'di ltar gzugs 
[\[123a.5\]]kyi mtshan nyid dang /_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi mtshan nyid dang /_rna ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_sna'i mtshan nyid dang /_lce'i mtshan 
[\[123a.6\]]nyid dang /_lus kyi mtshan nyid dang /_yid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_sgra'i mtshan nyid dang /_dri'i mtshan nyid dang /_ro'i mtshan nyid dang /_reg gi mtshan nyid dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par 
[\[123a.7\]]shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]nyid dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[123b.2\]]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[123b.3\]]tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 
[\[123b.4\]]mtshan nyid dang /_rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan 
[\[123b.5\]]nyid dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dang /_reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_sred pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_len pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[123b.6\]]rga shi'i mtshan nyid dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[123b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_

[\[124a.4\]]nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_dbang po'i mtshan nyid dang /_stobs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_byang chub 
[\[124a.5\]]kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_gzugs 
[\[124a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan nyid dang /_stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[124a.7\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dang /_gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]mtshan nyid dang /_byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dang /_snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[124b.2\]]'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[124b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gzugs ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/

[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong

[\[125b.1\]]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni

[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[126a.2\]]pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_
[\[126a.3\]]bam po dgu pa/_de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[126a.4\]]pa ni 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la rten cing rnam par spyod do/_/chos de la rim gror mdzad cing /_
[\[126a.5\]]mchod pa mdzad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pas rim gro mdzad pa dang /_bkur sti mdzad pa dang /_phu dud mdzad pa dang /_mchod pa mdzad pa de ni chos dang ldan pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[126a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ste/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[126a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa dgongs pa'o/_/rab 'byor gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing /_byas pa dran pa'o/_/zhes smra na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa'o/_/
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]zhes yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg 
[\[126b.2\]]pa gang gis byon pa dang /_lam gang gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i theg pa de nyid dang /_lam de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang /_bkur sti 
[\[126b.3\]]mdzad pa dang /_phu dud mdzad pa dang /_mchod pa mdzad pa dang /_yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa mkhyen pa dang /_byas pa dgongs par blta'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin 
[\[126b.4\]]gshegs pas/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brten te/_byed pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_ma byas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[126b.5\]]so/_/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_chos thams cad la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang /_
[\[126b.6\]]byas pa dgongs pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_chos thams cad la 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[126b.7\]]pa'i brdas 'jug ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad la 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]shes pa po ma mchis shing /_mthong ba po ma mchis ni ji ltar na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /_'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de 
[\[127a.2\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni shes pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mthong ba po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog gsob dbang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni shes pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[127a.3\]]mthong ba po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mthong ba po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor ji ltar na/_chos thams cad shes pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mthong ba po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas shing khongs su 
[\[127a.4\]]chud pa ma yin pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad shes pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mthong ba po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/de yang gzugs mthong ba

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na sa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na chu'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du

[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba ma

[\[130b.5\]]nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rang gi

[\[130b.7\]]lags/_ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_
[\[131a.2\]]ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa 
[\[131a.3\]]lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams 
[\[131a.4\]]mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_

[\[131a.6\]]mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong 
[\[131a.7\]]ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_
[\[131b.2\]]ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[131b.3\]]slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[131b.4\]]mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams 
[\[131b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam gzugs la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_gzugs mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston

[\[135a.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam yang dag par 
[\[135a.2\]]spong ba la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[135a.3\]]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam dbang po la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_dbang po rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam stobs la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_stobs rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[135a.4\]]phyir ston pa'o/_/nam byang chub kyi yan lag la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes 
[\[135a.5\]]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston 
[\[135a.6\]]pa'o/_/nam bsam gtan la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_bsam gtan rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams mthong

[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]brgyad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_mthar kyis 
[\[135b.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

[\[135b.4\]]'dzin la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam gzungs kyi sgo la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir
