[\[135b.6\]]'byung ba'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam so so yang dag par rig pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/
[\[135b.7\]]nam snying rje chen po la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_snying rje chen po mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_sangs 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam 
[\[136a.2\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[136a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam dgra bcom pa nyid la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rang byang chub la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung 
[\[136a.4\]]ba'i tshe/_rang byang chub mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/nam rnam pa 
[\[136a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs 
[\[136a.6\]]pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa 
[\[136a.7\]]zhes rjod de/_'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes rjod ce na/_gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/tshor ba stong ngo zhes byu bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'du byed stong ngo zhes bya 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig 
[\[136b.2\]]rten du rjod do/_/lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do/_/
[\[136b.3\]]ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do/_/chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya 
[\[136b.4\]]bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/yid kyi rnam par 
[\[136b.5\]]shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/
[\[136b.6\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig 
[\[137a.2\]]rten du rjod do/_/sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/
[\[137a.3\]]nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/ma rig pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/
[\[137a.4\]]rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/skye mched drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/tshor

[\[137a.6\]]rjod do/_/rga shi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo 
[\[137a.7\]]zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten

[\[137b.3\]]rten du rjod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do/_/rang bzhin 
[\[137b.4\]]stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten 
[\[137b.5\]]du rjod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[137b.6\]]rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/
[\[137b.7\]]stobs rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong ngo 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/bsam gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig 
[\[138a.2\]]rten du rjod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[138a.3\]]stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138a.4\]]pa'i stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/byams pa chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/
[\[138a.5\]]snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[138a.6\]]stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes 
[\[138a.7\]]pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston/_'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod/_'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138b.2\]]pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/_'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ji ltar ston ce na/_'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston 
[\[138b.3\]]to/_/'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na 'du shes stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na [{]myig [,]mig [}]stong zhes 
[\[138b.4\]]bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rna ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sna stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na yid stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[138b.5\]]'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten 
[\[138b.6\]]na chos stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig 
[\[138b.7\]]rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lus 
[\[139a.2\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[139a.3\]]tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[139a.4\]]kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig 
[\[139a.5\]]rten na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig 
[\[139a.6\]]rten na ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na skye mched 
[\[139a.7\]]drug stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sred pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na len pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'jig rten na srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na skye ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rga shi stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[139b.2\]]stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/

[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul 
[\[140a.2\]]kyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten na

[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'jig rten bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/snying rje chen po'i 'jig

[\[143a.5\]]pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/_'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/_gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du shes kyi

[\[143a.7\]]ston to/_/sna'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/ro'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya 
[\[143b.2\]]bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i rnam par 
[\[143b.3\]]shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes 
[\[143b.4\]]bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[143b.5\]]reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[143b.6\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 
[\[143b.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/chu'i 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam 
[\[144a.2\]]par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 
[\[144a.3\]]'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston 
[\[144a.4\]]to/_/len pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[144a.5\]]dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya 
[\[144a.6\]]bar ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[144a.7\]]kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[144b.2\]]'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben 
[\[144b.3\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar 
[\[144b.4\]]ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[144b.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/dbang po

[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[145a.2\]]'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes

[\[145a.4\]]'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[145a.5\]]dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig 
[\[145a.6\]]rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/_/

[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/_gzugs kyi

[\[146a\]]

[\[146b\]]

[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten

[\[147a.4\]]pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya 
[\[147a.5\]]bar ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[147a.6\]]nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston

[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[147b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las

[\[147b.4\]]rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes 
[\[147b.5\]]bya bar ston to/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[147b.6\]]rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten 
[\[147b.7\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[148a.2\]]ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 
[\[148a.3\]]'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[148a.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig 
[\[148a.5\]]rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[148a.6\]]rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das 
[\[148a.7\]]pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/_gzugs 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes 
[\[148b.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'jig rten

[\[152b.4\]]nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[152b.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[152b.6\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[152b.7\]]'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston 
[\[153a.2\]]to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten 
[\[153a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/byang chub kyi yan 
[\[153a.4\]]lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos 
[\[153a.5\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs 
[\[153a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[153a.7\]]'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/mngon 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[153b.2\]]pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/so so yang dag par 
[\[153b.3\]]rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya 
[\[153b.4\]]bar ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[153b.5\]]ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[153b.6\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[153b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/_gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig 
[\[154a.2\]]rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes 
[\[154a.3\]]bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/ro'i 
[\[154a.4\]]'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes 
[\[154a.5\]]bya bar ston to/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[154a.6\]]'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 
[\[154a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi 
[\[154b.2\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[154b.3\]]chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes 
[\[154b.4\]]pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 'jig 
[\[154b.5\]]rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/len 
[\[154b.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar 
[\[154b.7\]]ston to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes 
[\[155a.2\]]bya bar ston to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes 
[\[155a.3\]]bya bar ston to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/thog ma dang 
[\[155a.4\]]tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten 
[\[155a.5\]]zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[155a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 
[\[155a.7\]]'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi 
[\[155b.2\]]zhes bya bar ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[155b.3\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/mngon par 
[\[155b.4\]]shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[155b.5\]]rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/snying rje chen 
[\[155b.6\]]po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 
[\[155b.7\]]'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/lam 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 
[\[156a.2\]]'jig rten ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/_gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa 
[\[156a.3\]]nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa 
[\[156a.4\]]nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/
[\[156a.5\]]lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dri'i 
[\[156a.6\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par 
[\[156a.7\]]shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/
[\[156b.2\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[156b.3\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[156b.4\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar 
[\[156b.5\]]ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid 
[\[156b.6\]]ces bya bar ston to/_/chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[156b.7\]]khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/
[\[157a.2\]]reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/len pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/srid pa'i 
[\[157a.3\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/tshul 
[\[157a.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar 
[\[157a.5\]]ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston 
[\[157a.6\]]to/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/chen po stong pa 
[\[157a.7\]]nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid

[\[157b.3\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa 
[\[157b.4\]]nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong 
[\[157b.5\]]pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[157b.6\]]yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/
[\[157b.7\]]bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[158a.2\]]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/gzungs kyi sgo

[\[158a.5\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i

[\[158a.7\]]'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ci ltar ston ce na/_ji nas kyang 
[\[158b.2\]]'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar ston te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/_'jig rten pha 
[\[158b.3\]]rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam 
[\[158b.4\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du 
[\[158b.5\]]ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
[\[158b.6\]]de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi 
[\[158b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]don [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[159a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/_'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba'i don to/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[159a.3\]]tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin 
[\[159a.4\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[159a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byar ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[159a.6\]]sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor rnam 
[\[159a.7\]]grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]don gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_sus kyang gzhal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[159b.2\]]rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don 
[\[159b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa'ang su 'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_lhag pa lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor

[\[159b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab bo/_/rab 'byor sangs

[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/

[\[161a.7\]]rab 'byor [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa

[\[168a.1\]]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/

[\[171a\]]

[\[174a.1\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu ma mchis

[\[174a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam 
[\[174b.2\]]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab

[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du 
[\[182a.2\]]snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[182a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags/_ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_

[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]la/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /_tshad dang mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/

[\[192a.1\]]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_

[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]snying rje chen po gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la snying rje chen po [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[195b.2\]]ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dmigs su yod dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyun tu 
[\[195b.3\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195b.4\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195b.5\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod ma/_rang byang chub gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[195b.6\]]shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shis pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal 
[\[195b.7\]]du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir 
[\[196a.2\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'o/_/dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des ni chos 
[\[196a.3\]]thams cad bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/_bsam 
[\[196a.4\]]gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[196a.5\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba 'di ni tshad 
[\[196a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam 
[\[196a.7\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni nam mkha' 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[196b.2\]]pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de dag ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas 
[\[196b.3\]]rnams ni gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 
[\[196b.4\]]'di bstan pa'i tshe/_dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen pha stong phrag 
[\[196b.5\]]drug cu dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_de dag bcom ldan 
[\[196b.6\]]'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu gsum mo//_//
[\[196b.7\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[197a.2\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[197a.3\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[197a.4\]]pa 'di ni don tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
[\[197a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/
[\[197a.6\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[197a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus so/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so/_/dbang po lnga 'dus so/_/
[\[197b.2\]]stobs lnga 'dus so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so/_/bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'dus so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[197b.3\]]par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'dus so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so/_/
[\[197b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so/_/byams pa chen po 'dus so/_/snying 
[\[197b.5\]]rje chen po 'dus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dus so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so/_/rang 
[\[197b.6\]]byang chub 'dus so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa 'am/_
[\[197b.7\]]yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/_de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/_rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi 
[\[198a.2\]]bya ba byed do/_/rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba 
[\[198a.3\]]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[198a.4\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang mngon par chags 
[\[198a.5\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
[\[198a.6\]]rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[198a.7\]]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/sna la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/lce la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]gnas pa'o/_/lus la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/yid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/gzugs la yongs su 'dzin

[\[198b.7\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/

[\[199a.3\]]'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas 
[\[199a.4\]]pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon 
[\[199a.5\]]par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[199a.6\]]la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
[\[199a.7\]]sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[199b.2\]]dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par nye bar gnas pa'o/_/ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_

[\[204b.2\]]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[204b.3\]]la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa 
[\[204b.4\]]lags/_ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[204b.5\]]mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[204b.6\]]la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa 
[\[204b.7\]]lags/_ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na ngo bo

[\[205a.3\]]mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs 
[\[205a.4\]]su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa 
[\[205a.5\]]lags/_ji ltar na dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa

[\[205a.7\]]lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par chags pa 
[\[205b\]]

[\[206a\]]
