[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[229a.2\]]bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par 
[\[229a.3\]]chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[229a.4\]]bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/stobs rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[229a.5\]]yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[229a.6\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[229a.7\]]yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/mthar 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[229b.2\]]mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su 
[\[229b.3\]]gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[229b.4\]]bzhi la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[229b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[229b.6\]]mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[229b.7\]]bya'o/_/rang byang chub la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[230a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na 
[\[230a.3\]]spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/_rtogs par dka' ba ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]brtag pa/_brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/_
[\[230a.4\]]zhi zhing phra la mkhas pa dang /_byang ba dang yid gsal bas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230a.5\]]sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[230a.6\]]kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su 
[\[230a.7\]]gyur te/_de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab rmo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing /_bsams te gzhal ba dang /_brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis na/_gang shes rab 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid ches legs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[230b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la 
[\[230b.3\]]bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzad pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[230b.4\]]pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang /_spong ba 
[\[230b.5\]]gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[230b.6\]]chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i 
[\[230b.7\]]bzod par 'dus so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam 
[\[231a.2\]]pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[231a.3\]]chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 
[\[231a.4\]]'dus so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes 
[\[231a.5\]]gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni 
[\[231a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[231a.7\]]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /_spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'dus so/_/lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang sus kyang rung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas 'dri ba dang /_bris nas lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni 
[\[231b.2\]]myur du 'byung bar shes par bya yi/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/_mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa dag ni ma yin no/_/de 
[\[231b.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[231b.4\]]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[231b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan 
[\[231b.6\]]to/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[231b.7\]]'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing /_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_brgyad pa rnams 
[\[232a.2\]]byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/_
[\[232a.3\]]'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_de la bslabs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[232a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te/_'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'grib pa'am/_'phel bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gda' 'o zhes nas/_
[\[232a.5\]]'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[232a.6\]]snga nas dong ste/_de dag shin tu yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ring ba zhig tu phyin nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang bar gyur te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni/_'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/_/gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod 
[\[232a.7\]]do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing /_gong du 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid cing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_de gang nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[232b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_yongs su zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rmongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing the tsom [{]myi [,]mi [}]za/_nem nur [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la/_shes rab 
[\[232b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la bya ba de dag dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la/_yid la bya ba de dag 'gro'am/_'ong ngam 'greng ngam/_'dug gam nyal yang 
[\[232b.4\]]rung ste/_rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par 'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par 'brang ste/_rab 'byor dper na ba drus ma be'u [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[232b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du/_nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas/_dran pas 'dris par ma byas/_yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/_lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[232b.6\]]gtong na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang nas shi 'phos nas [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skyes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab 
[\[232b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to/_/gong du yang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to/_/bkur sti dang phu dud dang /_mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid 
[\[233a.2\]]kyis [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang nas shi 'phos nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skyes te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu mos par gyur par blta'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi 
[\[233a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la thos ma thag tu mos shing /_rmos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang /_bris nas lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton bgyid cing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa las yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing /_sangs rgyas 
[\[233a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/_ma mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_de de bzhin te/_
[\[233a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las/_de nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos 
[\[233a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri'o/_/bris nas kyang lung 'bog go/_kha ton byed do/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[233a.7\]]de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang bzung ngo bcangs so/_/yongs su bcangs mo/_/blags so/_/kun chub par byas so/_/kha ton du byas so/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byas so/_/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang de 
[\[233b.2\]]ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[233b.3\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'dri ba dang /_yongs su brtag par byas pas/_de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_
[\[233b.4\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan 
[\[233b.5\]]pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sdon gyi mthar bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[233b.6\]]tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 
[\[233b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bzod pa'i pha 
[\[234a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 
[\[234a.3\]]'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_
[\[234a.4\]]nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs 
[\[234a.5\]]su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[234a.6\]]yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 
[\[234a.7\]]'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar phyi stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis 
[\[234b.2\]]sdon gyi mthar phyi nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa 
[\[234b.3\]]gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[234b.4\]]bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi tra rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[234b.5\]]thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[234b.6\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar don dam pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_
[\[234b.7\]]nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sdon gyi mthar 'dus byas stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag

[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]mthar rang bzhin stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/_yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nem nur du 'gyur/_rmongs par 'gyur/_sems zhu ma par 'gyur/_sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rab

[\[236a\]]

[\[238b\]]

[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_yongs su dri ba dang yang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/_gang gis

[\[239a.3\]]bar mos shing /_bar bar mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur te/_de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing /_shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas/_theg pa 
[\[239a.4\]]la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi 
[\[239a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/_kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/_des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[239a.6\]]tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/_/nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/phyi stong pa 
[\[239a.7\]]nyid la ma bslabs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]la ma bslabs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa

[\[239b.3\]]pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[239b.4\]]rnams la ma bslabs so/_/dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so/_/stobs rnams la ma bslabs so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[239b.5\]]la ma bslabs so/_/bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la ma bslabs so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[239b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la ma bslabs so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so/_/
[\[239b.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so/_/byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so/_/snying 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rje chen po la ma bslabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[240a.2\]]'bras bu la ma bslabs so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/rang byang chub la ma bslabs so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so/_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems 
[\[240a.3\]]dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/_de ni dad pa tsam dang /_dga' ba tsam dang /_mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba 'am/_klag pa 'am/_lung 'bog pa 'am/_kha 
[\[240a.4\]]ton bya ba 'am/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri zhing lung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bog pa dang /_kha ton [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[240a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha 
[\[240a.6\]]rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_
[\[240a.7\]]phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[240b.2\]]'dogs pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs po dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa

[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang mthun par mi spyod/_mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gzungs kyi sgo

[\[242a.5\]]gnas gnyis dang /_sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/_de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 
[\[242a.6\]]sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/_kha ton du ma byas/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang pha rol la phan ma btags/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 
[\[242a.7\]]pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par ma spyod pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang /_sa gnyis po de 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu bzhi'o//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru 
[\[242b.2\]]zhig la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams shing ngam/_shing dum mam/_shing leb bam/_rkyal pa'am/_ro la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ju [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[242b.3\]]gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/_shing ngam shing dum mam/_shing leb bam/_rkyal pa 'am/_ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_bde zhing nyam nyes [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol 
[\[242b.4\]]gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/_ma nyes mnyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang dga' bcom dang /_mos pa tsam dang ldan 
[\[242b.5\]]pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 
[\[242b.6\]]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[242b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed tshul 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing mi rten pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du 
[\[243a.2\]]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[243a.3\]]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[243a.5\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[243a.6\]]rten pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa 
[\[243a.7\]]dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_
[\[243b.2\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_
[\[243b.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_
[\[243b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi 'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_dbang po rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri 
[\[243b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ston kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[243b.6\]]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[243b.7\]]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_mthar 
[\[244a.2\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[244a.3\]]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul 
[\[244a.4\]]bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du 
[\[244a.5\]]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing 
[\[244a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_byams pa chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_sangs 
[\[244a.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_kha ton du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten pa de dag ni bar ma 
[\[244b.2\]]dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur/_rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[244b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing /_bzod pa dang mos pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yod cing /_brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni shes 
[\[244b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/_/lung 'bog go_/kha ton byed do/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/_/rten par byed do/_/de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[244b.5\]]dad pa yod/_bzod pa yod/_mos pa yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/_dga' ba yod/_spro ba yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yod pa yin te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/_
[\[244b.6\]]yongs su bzung ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[244b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]su bzung ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[245a.2\]]kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[245a.3\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[245a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dran 
[\[245a.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang /_stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_byang 
[\[245a.6\]]chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 
[\[245a.7\]]yongs su bzung ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba 
[\[245b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /_snying rje chen pos 
[\[245b.3\]]yongs su bzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[245b.4\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_bar ma dor nye zho [{]myed [,]med [}]par nyan thos kyis las 'das/_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/_sems can yongs su smyin par byas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[245b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dam skyes pa la la zhig gis bum pa ma bsregs shing /_so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na/_rab 
[\[245b.6\]]'byor bum pa de ni ring por [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/_de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[245b.7\]]theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod mod/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su 
[\[246a.2\]]ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_sbyin 
[\[246a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chen po 
[\[246a.4\]]stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[246a.5\]]kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[246a.6\]]yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma 
[\[246a.7\]]bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dpas yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 
[\[246b.2\]]yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[246b.3\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su ma bzung /_mngon par shes po lngas yongs su ma bzung /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[246b.4\]]rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma 
[\[246b.5\]]bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_lam gyi rnam 
[\[246b.6\]]pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//_//_
[\[246b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyis 'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_skyes pa'am/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam/_mtsho'am mtshe'u 'am/_khron pa nas chu chu na/_rab 
[\[247a.2\]]'byor chu chu ba de'i bum pa des ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_
[\[247a.3\]]mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod la de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_thabs mkhas pas 
[\[247a.4\]]yongs su bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_sbyin 
[\[247a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_chen po stong pa 
[\[247a.6\]]nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[247a.7\]]su bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[247b.2\]]su bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung /_yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung /_dbang pos yongs su bzung /_stobs kyis yongs su bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs 
[\[247b.3\]]su bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung /_bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas 
[\[247b.4\]]yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su 
[\[247b.5\]]bzung /_mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung /_ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung /_gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung /_so so yang 
[\[247b.6\]]dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_
[\[247b.7\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ma dor nye zhor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_ma nyes mnyams par bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing /_zag lhan ma 
[\[248a.2\]]byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na/_rab 'byor gru de ni zhig par 'gyur te/_gru yang logs shig_/rdzas kyang logs shig tu song nas/_de ltar tshong pa de thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_rin po che chen po las 
[\[248a.3\]]yongs su phang bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_
[\[248a.4\]]dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[248a.5\]]pas yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma 
[\[248a.6\]]bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma 
[\[248a.7\]]bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thog ma 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[248b.2\]]yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma 
[\[248b.3\]]bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stobs rnams 
[\[248b.4\]]kyis yongs su ma bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams kyis 
[\[248b.5\]]yongs su ma bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[248b.6\]]'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su ma bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su 
[\[248b.7\]]ma bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[249a.2\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[249a.3\]]nyid kyi rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las phang bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma do'i nye zho gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[249a.4\]]kyi sa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing shin tu bstar ba chu la gtong zhing rdzas bcug na/_rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par 
[\[249a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_gru des phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang 
[\[249a.6\]]yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod la/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs 
[\[249a.7\]]su bzung /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_tshul khrims 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[249b.2\]]kyis yongs su bzung /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[249b.3\]]stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[249b.4\]]su bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[249b.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis 
[\[249b.6\]]yongs su bzung /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_bsam 
[\[249b.7\]]gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[250a.2\]]kyis yongs su bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung /_byams pa chen pos 
[\[250a.3\]]yongs su bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_rnam pa 
[\[250a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur 
[\[250a.5\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang 
[\[250a.6\]]yod/_mi gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod la/_de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/_thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin par gyur/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 
[\[250a.7\]]gyur/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pas yongs su zin par gyur/_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_chen po stong 
[\[250b.2\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[250b.3\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[250b.4\]]nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[250b.5\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_
[\[250b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_stobs rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_
[\[250b.7\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su zin par gyur/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]yongs su zin par gyur/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs 
[\[251a.2\]]su zin par gyur/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su zin par gyur/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_
[\[251a.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su zin par gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su zin par gyur/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su zin par gyur/_byams 
[\[251a.4\]]pa chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/_snying rje chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[251a.5\]]shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta 
[\[251a.6\]]ste/_dper na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/_rgas pa/_dgog tu gyur pa/_'khobs pa zhig yod la/_de'i lus la rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan nam/_'dus pa'i nad kyis btab na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_
[\[251a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]de gcig pu nyam rangs su khri las ldang nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang /_rgyang grags gcig gam/_rgyang grags gnyis su yang mchi 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de rgas pa dang /_bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du/_khri las ldang nus su lags kyang mchi [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 
[\[251b.2\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/_mi gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba 
[\[251b.3\]]yang yod mod/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[251b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[251b.5\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[251b.6\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang 
[\[251b.7\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_yang dag par spong 
[\[252a.2\]]ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'phags 
[\[252a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[252a.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[252a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su ma bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[252a.6\]]stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_sangs rgyas 
[\[252a.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/_
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_thabs mkhas 
[\[252b.2\]]pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[252b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[252b.4\]]yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[252b.5\]]yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_dor 
[\[252b.6\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba 
[\[252b.7\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_
[\[253a.2\]]dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_'phags 
[\[253a.3\]]pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_
[\[253a.4\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su ma bzung 
[\[253a.5\]]ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma 
[\[253a.6\]]bzung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[253a.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/_rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa/_'khobs pa de nyid/_rlung ngam/_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan nam/_'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la/_de khri las ldang bar 'dod 
[\[253b.2\]]na/_de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/_brten nas 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod ci dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo /_/khyod ni bdag cag gis bzung gis gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du lam du bar ma 
[\[253b.3\]]dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lo bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_mos 
[\[253b.4\]]pa yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_spro ba yang yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba yang yod/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yang yod la/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_thabs mkhas pas 
[\[253b.5\]]yongs su bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 
[\[253b.6\]]bzung /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_
[\[253b.7\]]chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]yongs su bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_
[\[254a.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[254a.3\]]kyis yongs su bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_
[\[254a.4\]]stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_bsam gtan 
[\[254a.5\]]rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[254a.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[254a.7\]]kyis yongs su bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[254b.2\]]su bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[254b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag 
[\[254b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[254b.5\]]khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/legs so/_/rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs 
[\[254b.6\]]su gtong na/_de bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa bsgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[254b.7\]]sgom na/_de yang bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/_de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems te bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/bdag ni sbyin pa 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]byed pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo /_/bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan no/_/bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo/_/bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/_/bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[255a.2\]]brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o/_/
[\[255a.3\]]bdag ni shes rab bsgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di sgom mo/_/bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/_de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/_sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de tshul 
[\[255a.4\]]khrims rlom sems su byed/_tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/_bzod pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni bzod pa dang 
[\[255a.5\]]ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/_brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/_bsam gtan 
[\[255a.6\]]gyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de shes rab rlom sems su byed/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[255a.7\]]na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[255b.2\]]rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de 
[\[255b.3\]]ring du song ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_pha rol yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes te/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[255b.4\]]rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[255b.5\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
