[\[255b.6\]]yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[255b.7\]]nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[256a.2\]]rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[256a.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_tshad 
[\[256a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[256a.5\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su ma bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis 
[\[256a.6\]]yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_snying rje 
[\[256a.7\]]chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs 
[\[256b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshul khrims srung /_thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par bzod pa sgom/_thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par brtson 'grus rtsom/_thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[256b.3\]]par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug_/thabs [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes rab sgom zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo /_/'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims 
[\[256b.4\]]ni 'di srung ngo /_/bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/_/bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[256b.5\]]go/_/bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di sgom mo/_/zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/_sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/_/zhes rlom sems su byed/_de tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/_
[\[256b.6\]]tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/_bzod pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de 
[\[256b.7\]]brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/_brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de bas ma gtan rlom sems su byed/_bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_de shes rab rlom sems su byed/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar 
[\[257a.2\]]de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag 
[\[257a.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[257a.4\]]la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[257a.5\]]ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_
[\[257a.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[257a.7\]]de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de lta yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_pha rol yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes te/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ma bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /_nang stong pa nyid 
[\[257b.2\]]kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[257b.3\]]yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs 
[\[257b.4\]]su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[257b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dran pa nye 
[\[257b.6\]]bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[257b.7\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par 
[\[258a.2\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sa yongs su ma bzung /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[258a.3\]]pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung /_byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[258a.4\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[258a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs 
[\[258a.6\]]rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung zhing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems 
[\[258a.7\]]kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims sa srung ngo /_/bzod pa bsgom na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rtsom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan sgom na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma 
[\[258b.2\]]lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo /_/zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/
[\[258b.3\]]bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/_/bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag 
[\[258b.4\]]la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems te/_de sbyin pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed sbyin pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems 
[\[258b.5\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/tshul khrims rlom sems su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/bzod pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bzod pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[258b.6\]]bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/brtson 'grus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/bsam 
[\[258b.7\]]gtan rnams rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/shes rab rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_shes rab kyis rloms sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[259a.2\]]pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems 
[\[259a.3\]]su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[259a.4\]]la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha 
[\[259a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ni 'di ltar de zlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de lta yin la gang zag byang chub sems 
[\[259a.6\]]dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du sang ba shes shing pha rol shes te/_des kyang rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams 
[\[259a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan 
[\[259b.2\]]thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_
[\[259b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[259b.4\]]nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_
[\[259b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[259b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/chen 
[\[259b.7\]]po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[260a.2\]]rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 
[\[260a.3\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[260a.4\]]kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[260a.5\]]rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 
[\[260a.6\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[260a.7\]]kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 
[\[260b.2\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[260b.3\]]bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[260b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 
[\[260b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_
[\[260b.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam 
[\[260b.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhes yongs 
[\[261a.2\]]su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhes yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung 
[\[261a.3\]]ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhes yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 
[\[261a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhes yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan 
[\[261a.5\]]thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[261a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[261a.7\]]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/_
[\[261b.2\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_
[\[261b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261b.4\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung bas/_
[\[261b.5\]]nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_
[\[261b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[261b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[262a.2\]]kyis yongs su bzung bas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po 
[\[262a.3\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[262a.4\]]pas yongs su bzung ba/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs 
[\[262a.5\]]su bzung ba/_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[262a.6\]]bzung ba/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_
[\[262a.7\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_rang 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[262b.2\]]yongs su bzung ba/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_
[\[262b.3\]]stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_bsam gtan 
[\[262b.4\]]bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[262b.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung ba/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su 
[\[262b.6\]]bzung ba/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba/_byams pa chen pos yongs 
[\[262b.7\]]su bzung ba/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/_rnam pa 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba de/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ngo /_/rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[263a.2\]]'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs dang ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung /_thabs dang ldan par bzod pa bsgom/_thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom/_thabs dang ldan 
[\[263a.3\]]par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug_/thabs dang ldan par shes rab sgom zhing /_'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/sbyin pa 'di yongs su gtong ngo /_/'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/'di 
[\[263a.4\]]ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo /_/tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/_/bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/brtson 
[\[263a.5\]]'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di 
[\[263a.6\]]sgom mo snyam du mi sems so/_/de sbyin pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sbyin pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de tshul khrims zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul khrims kyis rlom sems 
[\[263a.7\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de bzad pa zla ma sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bzod pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de brtson 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]'grus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_brtson 'grus kyis zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de bas ma gtan zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni 
[\[263b.2\]]bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de shes rab zlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog 
[\[263b.3\]]pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam 
[\[263b.4\]]par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[263b.5\]]zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta 
[\[263b.6\]]ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_bsam 
[\[263b.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ltar de rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de lta yang yin la/_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing /_pha rol shes kyang des rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[264a.2\]]yongs su bzung ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[264a.3\]]pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_phyi 
[\[264a.4\]]nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[264a.5\]]kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dor ba 
[\[264a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[264a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bzung ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[264b.2\]]stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_bsam 
[\[264b.3\]]gtan bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas 
[\[264b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas yongs su bzung ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[264b.5\]]rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[264b.6\]]bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang /_byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid 
[\[264b.7\]]kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bya ba zung bas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ste/_
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu lnga'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis/_
[\[265a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'i chen pos/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin 
[\[265a.3\]]pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[265a.4\]]phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[265a.5\]]phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 
[\[265a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[265a.7\]]ston pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/_de dag la bsten par bya'o/_/bsnyen par bya'o/_/bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/_/de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[265b.2\]]tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[265b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu shes 
[\[265b.4\]]rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig_/tshor bar rtog par ma 
[\[265b.5\]]byed cig_/'du shes su rtog par ma byed cig_/'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]tu rtog par ma byed cig_/rna bar rtog par ma byed cig_/snar rtog par ma byed cig_/lcer rtog par ma byed cig_/
[\[265b.6\]]lus su rtog par ma byed cig_/yid du rtog par ma byed cig_/gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig_/sgrar rtog par ma byed cig_/drir rtog par ma byed cig_/ror rtog par ma byed cig_/reg tu rtog par ma byed cig_/chos su rtog par ma byed 
[\[265b.7\]]cig_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]ma byed cig_/yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/lce'i 'dus te reg 
[\[266a.2\]]par rtog par ma byed cig_/lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/yid kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor 
[\[266a.3\]]bar rtog par ma byed cig_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/yid kyi 
[\[266a.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig_/chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams su rtog par ma 
[\[266a.5\]]byed cig_/rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig_/nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig_/ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig_/'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam 
[\[266a.6\]]par shes par rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig_/skye mched drug tu rtog par ma byed cig_/reg par rtog par ma byed cig_/tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig_/sred par rtog par ma byed cig_/len par 
[\[266a.7\]]rtog par ma byed cig_/srid par rtog par ma byed cig_/skye bar rtog par ma byed cig_/rga shir rtog par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/shes rab 
[\[266b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/phyi stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/stong pa 
[\[266b.3\]]nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/

[\[266b.5\]]cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog 
[\[266b.6\]]par ma byed cig_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/yang dag par spong ba rnams su 
[\[266b.7\]]rtog par ma byed cig_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/lam 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig_/bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma byed cig_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir 
[\[267a.2\]]rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam par thar pa brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[267a.3\]]rtog par ma byed cig_/mngon par shes pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/ting nge 'dzin rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog par ma byed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig_/
[\[267a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig_/byams pa chen por rtog par ma byed cig_/snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad du 
[\[267a.5\]]rtog par ma byed cig_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rtog par ma byed cig_/thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[267a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[267a.7\]]thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[267b.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma

[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/

[\[268a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[268a.7\]]kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i sa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i chu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i nam

[\[269a\]]

[\[269a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rnam 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par

[\[270b.1\]]par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/

[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni gzugs so/_/sgra la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sgra'o/_/dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dri'o/_/ro

[\[271a.3\]]kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni chos so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir

[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg

[\[271b.7\]]la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ni sa'i khams so/_/chu'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni chu'i khams so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni

[\[272a.3\]]nam mkha'i khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/ma rig pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi 
[\[272a.4\]]bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni ma rig pa'o/_/'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[272a.5\]]pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs so/_/skye mched drug la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[272a.6\]]'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni skye mched drug go/_/reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni reg pa'o/_/tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]kyi bu 'dod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan

[\[275b.5\]]po bcu dgu pa/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir

[\[275b.7\]]de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs bsu dgrol ba'i phyir ro/_/bzod pa ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro/_/brtson 'grus ci rtsom pa de thams 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro/_/bsam gtan ci la mnyam par gzhog pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro/_/shes 
[\[276a.2\]]rab ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[276a.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'dod cing /_'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir/_yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[276a.4\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'gro ba'i rgyud lnga nas yongs su bton cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i thang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god de/_rab 'byor 
[\[276a.5\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing /_'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 
[\[276a.6\]]'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[276a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/_sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su bkrol zhing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i thang bde 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing /_'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang 
[\[276b.2\]]dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[276b.3\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/_'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag las sems can rnams 
[\[276b.4\]]yongs su skyob cing /_de dag spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/_sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[276b.5\]]po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[276b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/_'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[276b.7\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/_sems can skye ba'i chos can dang sems can rga ba'i chos can dang /_sems can na ba'i chos can dang /_sems can 'chi ba'i chos can dang /_sems can mya ngan dang smre 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi 
[\[277a.2\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su bkrol zhing /_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs

[\[297a\]]

[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]ni rna ba'o/_/'di ni sna'o/_/'di ni lce'o/_/'di ni lus so/_/'di ni yid do/_/'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni sgra'o/_/'di ni dri'o/_/'di ni ro'o/_/'di ni reg go_/'di ni chos so/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rna ba'i

[\[300b.3\]]'o/_/'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[300b.4\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni 
[\[301a.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[301a.3\]]do/_/'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[301a.4\]]nyid do/_/'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/'di ni dbang po rnams so/_/'di ni stobs rnams 
[\[301a.5\]]so/_/'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/'di ni bsam gtan rnams so/_/'di ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/'di ni gzugs med 
[\[301a.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[301a.7\]]'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]rnams so/_/'di ni byams pa chen po'o/_/'di ni snying rje chen po'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/
[\[301b.2\]]'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/'di ni rang byang chub bo/_/'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[301b.3\]]rnams chos de ltar zhi ba dag la rtog kyang zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing /_bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[301b.4\]]sangs rgyas nas/_chos de ltar zhi ba dang de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o snyam du sems pa ni dka' ba byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[301b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[301b.6\]]rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_chu klung ngam/_chu bran nam/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[301b.7\]]de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'du shes ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'du byed ni/_
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[302a.2\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/rna ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sna ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lce ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[302a.3\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/lus ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/yid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[302a.4\]]su chad pa'o/_/sgra ni sdon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dri ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/ro ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad 
[\[302a.5\]]pa'o/_/reg ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/chos ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[302a.6\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lce'i rnam 
[\[302a.7\]]par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[302b.2\]]su chad pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[302b.3\]]su chad pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sna'i 
[\[302b.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[302b.5\]]kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[302b.6\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/chu'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rlung gi khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad 
[\[302b.7\]]pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/ma rig pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[303a.2\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sred pa ni sngon gyi 
[\[303a.3\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/len pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/srid pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/skye ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/
[\[303a.4\]]rga shi ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/bzod 
[\[303a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sdon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[303a.6\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i 
[\[303a.7\]]mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sdon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sdon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sdon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi 
[\[303b.2\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/
[\[303b.3\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[303b.4\]]su chad pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi 
[\[303b.5\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dran pa 
[\[303b.6\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i 
[\[303b.7\]]mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[304a.2\]]yongs su chad pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[304a.3\]]dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/
[\[304a.4\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[304a.5\]]ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/
[\[304a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs 
[\[304a.7\]]su chad pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni sngon gyi 
[\[304b.2\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 
[\[304b.3\]]sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su 
[\[304b.4\]]chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o/_/de ni bzang po'o/_/de ni yang dag pa ste/_'di ltar stong pa nyid dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lam gyi rgyun chad pa dang /_sred pa zad pa dang /_'dra ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_
[\[304b.5\]]'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_de ltar zhi ba dang /_de ltar bzang ba'i 
[\[304b.6\]]chos de dag ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi gling du gyur pa yin no//_//
[\[304b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyer gcig pa/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas 'khris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i 
[\[305a.2\]]sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing /_gti mug gi mun pa dang /_ma rig pa'i mun nag dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i rab rib sel te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[305a.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems 
[\[305a.4\]]can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing /_'od 'byin pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[305a.5\]]drug dang ldan pa/_byin gyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de dag gi don ma nor bar sems can rnams la yang dag par ston te/_sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par skul zhing sbyor la/_gzhog cing rab 
[\[305a.6\]]tu 'god de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no/_/
[\[305a.7\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can lam ngan par zhugs la tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams la sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don tu 
[\[305b.2\]]mya ngan dang gnod pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba nub par bya ba dang /_rigs pa dang ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir gcig la brten pa'i lam ston te/_rab 'byor de 
[\[305b.3\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[305b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla 
[\[305b.5\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/tshor

[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]phyir chos ston to/_/dbang po rnams skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/stobs rnams skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon

[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[310b.3\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/rang byang chub/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[310b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[310b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi lam du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can 
[\[311a.2\]]rnams la chos ston to/_/'du shes ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'du byed ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par shes pa ni nam 
[\[311a.3\]]mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rna ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos 
[\[311a.4\]]ston to/_/sna ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lce ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lus ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems 
[\[311a.5\]]can rnams la chos ston to/_/yid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sgra ni nam
