[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[311b.2\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[311b.3\]]to/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[311b.4\]]ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes 
[\[311b.5\]]bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams 
[\[311b.6\]]la chos ston to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[311b.7\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[312a.2\]]ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sa'i khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/chu'i khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[312a.3\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[312a.4\]]khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/ma rig pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes 
[\[312a.5\]]bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'du byed ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/
[\[312a.6\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/skye mched drug ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/reg pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya 
[\[312a.7\]]bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshor ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sred pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/len pa ni 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/srid pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/skye ba ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos 
[\[312b.2\]]ston to/_/rga shi ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[312b.3\]]tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[312b.4\]]ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam 
[\[312b.5\]]mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems 
[\[312b.6\]]can rnams la chos ston to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/
[\[312b.7\]]chen po stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[313a.2\]]pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam 
[\[313a.3\]]mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can 
[\[313a.4\]]zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[313a.5\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams 
[\[313a.6\]]la chos ston to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/
[\[313a.7\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/dbang po rnams ni nam 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/stobs rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems 
[\[313b.2\]]can rnams la chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams 
[\[313b.3\]]la chos ston to/_/bsam gtan rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[313b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/mthar kyis 
[\[313b.5\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul 
[\[313b.6\]]can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[313b.7\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar 
[\[314a.2\]]sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/byams pa chen po ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/snying rje chen po ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi

[\[317b.4\]]la chos ston to/_/stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[317b.6\]]pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ngo

[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ngo zhes

[\[318b\]]

[\[318b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi lam du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de

[\[319a.3\]]'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[319a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor

[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyi ngang tshul can te de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor

[\[319b.3\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smyig rgyu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smyig rgyu la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chu zla'i ngang tshul can

[\[319b.7\]]'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba dang bsnan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbri ba dang bsnan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor

[\[320a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyer gnyis pa/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phrad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang bral ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[320a.5\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'dre ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bdag nyid kyang shin tu 
[\[320a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems can nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_
[\[320a.7\]]de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor srog nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'gro ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_
[\[320b.2\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_gso ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gso ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor 
[\[320b.3\]]chos thams cad ni skyes bu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skyes bu nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad 
[\[320b.4\]]ni gang zag gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gang zag nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni shed 
[\[320b.5\]]can gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shed can nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni shed bdag gi 
[\[320b.6\]]ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shed bdag nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni byed pa po'i 
[\[320b.7\]]ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byed pa po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug pa po'i ngang tshul 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byed du 'jug pa po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni slong ba po'i

[\[321a.3\]]tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yongs su slong ba po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba po'i ngang tshul 
[\[321a.4\]]can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshor ba po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor bar byed pa po'i ngang tshul 
[\[321a.5\]]can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshor bar byed pa po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni shes pa po'i ngang tshul can 
[\[321a.6\]]te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes pa po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mthong ba po'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[321a.7\]]ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mthong ba po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[321b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bde ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[321b.3\]]bdag nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sdug pa nyid 
[\[321b.4\]]kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_
[\[321b.5\]]de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor/_sdug bsngal nyid kyang shin tu 
[\[321b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bdag 
[\[321b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi 
[\[322a.2\]]dngos po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu 
[\[322a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_
[\[322a.4\]]de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin tu 
[\[322a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong 
[\[322a.6\]]ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 
[\[322a.7\]]'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 
[\[322b.2\]]kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba'i ngang tshul 
[\[322b.3\]]can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos gang la yang g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can 
[\[322b.4\]]te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de 
[\[322b.5\]]dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshor ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'du shes kyi ngang tshul can te/_
[\[322b.6\]]de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'du shes nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'du byed kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang 
[\[322b.7\]]tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'du byed nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[323a.2\]]ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rna ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/

[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgra nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dri'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]shes pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab

[\[324a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las

[\[324b\]]

[\[324b.5\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las

[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te

[\[325a.3\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

[\[325a.5\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_sa'i khams kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sa'i khams nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta

[\[325a.7\]]yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba 
[\[325b\]]

[\[325b.5\]]'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_'du byed kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'du byed nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 
[\[325b.6\]]'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la

[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_skye mched drug gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skye 
[\[326a.2\]]mched drug nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_reg pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byar reg pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[326a.3\]]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_tshor ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshor ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 
[\[326a.4\]]'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_sred pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sred pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la 
[\[326a.5\]]yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_len pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor len pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 
[\[326a.6\]]'byor chos thams cad ni/_srid pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor srid pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos 
[\[326a.7\]]thams cad ni/_skye ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skye ba nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rga 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]shi'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rga shi nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[326b.2\]]ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[326b.3\]]tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_
[\[326b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor 
[\[326b.5\]]chos thams cad ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta 
[\[326b.6\]]ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu 
[\[326b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang 
[\[327a.2\]]stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor phyi stong pa 
[\[327a.3\]]nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor phyi nang stong 
[\[327a.4\]]pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[327a.5\]]'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[327a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/
[\[327a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las 
[\[327b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[327b.3\]]ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[327b.4\]]nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad 
[\[327b.5\]]ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos 
[\[327b.6\]]thams cad ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 
[\[327b.7\]]'byor chos thams cad ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 
[\[328a.2\]]'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_
[\[328a.3\]]de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[328a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[328a.5\]]shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[328a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[328a.7\]]na/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[328b.2\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbang po'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[328b.3\]]dbang po rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stobs kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[328b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang 
[\[328b.5\]]shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[328b.6\]]'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[328b.7\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bsam gtan gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/
[\[329a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/
[\[329a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam par thar pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/
[\[329a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/
[\[329a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[329a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 
[\[329a.7\]]'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]cad ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzungs kyi sgo'i ngang tshul can 
[\[329b.2\]]te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[329b.3\]]ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni 
[\[329b.4\]]ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las 
[\[329b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni byams pa chen po'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[329b.6\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byams pa chen po ya nga shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[329b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de 
[\[330a.2\]]las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul 
[\[330a.3\]]de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/_de dag 
[\[330a.4\]]ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul 
[\[330a.5\]]de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[330a.6\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/_de dag ni ngang 
[\[330a.7\]]tshul de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la su zhig 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]mos par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par 
[\[330b.2\]]gyur pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyin pa/_sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[330b.3\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang 
[\[330b.4\]]mtshan ma dang /_rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u sum cu drug go/_//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[330b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_'dod chags rnam par bstsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[330b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/_zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par bstsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/_'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i 
[\[330b.7\]]rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/_zhe sdang dang gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[331a.2\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/_'dod chags dang /_'dod chags [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pas/_dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[331a.3\]]po de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang gti mug dang gti mug [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[331a.4\]]mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 
[\[331a.5\]]shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/_sems 
[\[331a.6\]]can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can 
[\[331a.7\]]ni/_sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang de 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]la sems can dang /_sems can du gdags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 
[\[331b.2\]]sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go ca 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[331b.4\]]ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshor ba yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go ca de ni tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

[\[331b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'du byed kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa

[\[335a.7\]]rab 'byor 'du byed kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub
