[\[339b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin 
[\[340a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i 
[\[340a.3\]]phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[340a.4\]]kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[340a.5\]]lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 
[\[340a.6\]]'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang 
[\[340a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_
[\[340b.2\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[340b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang 
[\[340b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[340b.5\]]'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthar 
[\[340b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar 
[\[340b.7\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 'brel pa ma yin 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[341a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mngon par 
[\[341a.3\]]shes pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa 
[\[341a.4\]]ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[341a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin 
[\[341a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub 
[\[341a.7\]]sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go 
[\[341b.2\]]cha de ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[341b.3\]]dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[341b.4\]]go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[341b.5\]]snying rje chen po yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 
[\[341b.6\]]'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/
[\[341b.7\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]phyir go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[342a.2\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[342a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[342a.4\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la 
[\[342a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[342a.6\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi 
[\[342a.7\]]rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_byang chub 
[\[342b.2\]]sems dpa'i go cha yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag 
[\[342b.3\]]gis/_sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/_go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[342b.4\]]sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/_go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[342b.5\]]bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang 
[\[342b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/_sems can gyi don du go che 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/_de skad du byang chub sems 
[\[342b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o zhes smras/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des sems can nyi tse nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/_ye shes nyung zad nyi tse zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[343a.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos ni/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[343a.3\]]slad du go cha 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/_ye shes nyung zad 
[\[343a.4\]]nyi tse'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[343a.5\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/_de ni sus kyang bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_ci yang bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[343a.6\]]zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/_gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/_gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_nam mkha' bsgom 
[\[343a.7\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_chos thams cad bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[343b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzugs bsgom 
[\[343b.3\]]pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[343b.4\]]'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[343b.5\]]pa 'di ni/_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[343b.6\]]phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[343b.7\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[344a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[344a.3\]]pa 'di ni/_ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[344a.4\]]chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[344a.5\]]bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[344a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[344a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di 
[\[344b.2\]]ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[344b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[344b.4\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[344b.5\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[344b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[344b.7\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[345a.2\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[345a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[345a.4\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[345a.5\]]'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[345a.6\]]bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[345a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[345b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[345b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[345b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[345b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[345b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[345b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[346a.2\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[346a.3\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[346a.4\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[346a.5\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[346a.6\]]phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[346a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[346b.2\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_don 
[\[346b.3\]]dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[346b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[346b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dor ba 
[\[346b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[346b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di 
[\[347a.2\]]ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[347a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[347a.4\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[347a.5\]]rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[347a.6\]]pa 'di ni/_stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[347a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa 'di ni/_bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[347b.2\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[347b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[347b.4\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[347b.5\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[347b.6\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzungs kyi sgo bsgom po rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_de bzhin 
[\[347b.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[348a.2\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[348a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[348a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[348a.5\]]bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang byang 
[\[348a.6\]]chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[348a.7\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]'di ni/_gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byar 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[348b.2\]]'du shes bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o/_/rab 'byar 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'du byed bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[348b.3\]]rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba 
[\[348b.4\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[348b.5\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 
[\[348b.6\]]'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[348b.7\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_
[\[349a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[349a.3\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[349a.4\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 
[\[349a.5\]]'di ni/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[349a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta 
[\[349a.7\]]ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg 
[\[349b.2\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_
[\[349b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[349b.4\]]tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[349b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[349b.6\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bsgom pa rnam par [(]/[,) ]
[\[349b.7\]]bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[350a.2\]]tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[350a.3\]]bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[350a.4\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[350a.5\]]bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 
[\[350a.6\]]len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skye ba bsgom pa rnam 
[\[350a.7\]]par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[350b.2\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[350b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[350b.4\]]tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[350b.5\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[350b.6\]]bsgom pa 'di ni/_shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[350b.7\]]pa 'di ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam 
[\[351a.2\]]par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[351a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[351a.4\]]phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[351a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 
[\[351a.6\]]'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 
[\[351a.7\]]rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mtha' 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[351b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[351b.3\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam 
[\[351b.4\]]par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[351b.5\]]stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[351b.6\]]pa 'di ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[351b.7\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_stobs bsgom pa 
[\[352a.2\]]rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[352a.3\]]brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[352a.4\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[352a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[352a.6\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[352a.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_gzungs kyi sgo bsgom 
[\[352b.2\]]pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_
[\[352b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[352b.4\]]phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[352b.5\]]tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[352b.6\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 
[\[352b.7\]]rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rang byang chub 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[353a.2\]]pa bsgom pa 'di ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[353a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[353a.4\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[353a.5\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[353a.6\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[353a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[353b.2\]]dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par 
[\[353b.3\]]chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes phyi nang stong pa 
[\[353b.4\]]nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[353b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par 
[\[353b.6\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang 
[\[353b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[354a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub

[\[354a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems

[\[354a.7\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[354b.2\]]mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[354b.3\]]dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_
[\[354b.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_

[\[354b.6\]]par spong ba rnams la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la/_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gyi

[\[355a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[356b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dam zhes/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag

[\[356b.3\]]gyis bstan pa la snying por [{]myi [,]mi [}]lta'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol gyi dad pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems

[\[357a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /_de'i yid phyir nur bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/_thos nas kyang 'dzin 
[\[357a.2\]]cing 'chang la/_klog cing kun chub par byed de/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[357a.3\]]yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs te/_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[357a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong pa nyid la

[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub

[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di

[\[358b.6\]]par 'gyur/_de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/_chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub

[\[359a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/_sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/_smyig rgyu la

[\[359a.7\]]la rtog pa lags sam/_tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/_'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la rtog pa lags sam/_rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/_sna la rtog pa lags

[\[359b.1\]]sam/_lce la rtog pa lags sam/_lus la rtog pa lags sam/_yid la rtog pa lags sam/_gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/_sgra la rtog pa lags sam/_dri la rtog pa lags sam/_ro la rtog pa lags sam/_reg la rtog pa lags

[\[359b.4\]]lags sam/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_rna ba'i 
[\[359b.5\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa 
[\[359b.6\]]lags sam/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/_chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la rtog pa lags sam/_rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/_
[\[359b.7\]]nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/_ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/_'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la rtog pa 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]lags sam/_skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/_reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/_tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/_sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/_len pa la rtog pa lags sam/_srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/_
[\[360a.2\]]skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/_rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_brtson 'grus 
[\[360a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/_nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_
[\[360a.4\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_'dus 
[\[360a.5\]]ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[360a.6\]]la rtog pa lags sam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_ngo bo 
[\[360a.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]la rtog pa lags sam/_dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[360b.2\]]rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags 
[\[360b.3\]]sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rtog pa lags sam/_mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags 
[\[360b.4\]]sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_so so yang dag par 
[\[360b.5\]]rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/_snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/_thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_
[\[360b.6\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_gzugs la 
[\[360b.7\]]rtog pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no/_/'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sna la rtog pa ma 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]yin no/_lce la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lus la rtog pa ma yin no/_/yid la rtog pa ma yin no/_/gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sgra la rtog pa ma yin no/_/dri la rtog pa ma yin no/_/ro la rtog pa ma yin no/_/reg la rtog 
[\[361a.2\]]pa ma yin no/_/chos la rtog pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lus kyi 
[\[361a.3\]]rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[361a.4\]]la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/

[\[361a.6\]]pa ma yin no/_/sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa

[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]rtog pa ma yin no/_/sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/len pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol

[\[362a\]]

[\[362a.4\]]byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/_/snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/_/thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa 
[\[362a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/_rnam par ma byas/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song /_phyogs na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[362a.6\]]gnas/_yul na yang mi gnas/_gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/_de la grangs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gang la grangs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /_'gro ba dang 'ong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[362a.7\]]nus te/_/gzugs kyis ma yin no/_/tshor bas ma yin no/_/'du shes kyis ma yin no/_/'du byed kyis ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pas ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gis ma yin no/_/rna bas ma yin no/_/snas ma yin no/_/lces ma yin no/_/lus kyis ma

[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/stong pa

[\[363a.3\]]yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/_/

[\[363b\]]

[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

[\[364a.5\]]nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/yid kyi 'dus te

[\[364a.7\]]nyid do/_/rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam 
[\[364b.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[364b.3\]]srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/tshul 
[\[364b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bsam 
[\[364b.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[364b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa 
[\[364b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[365a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[365a.3\]]stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[365a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa 
[\[365a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[365a.6\]]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[365a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid do/_/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid 
[\[365b.2\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[365b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[365b.4\]]nyid gcig pa'o/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de 
[\[365b.5\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa

[\[366a\]]

[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

[\[366b.7\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin

[\[367a.3\]]de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

[\[367b.1\]]'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa

[\[369a.3\]]pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_

[\[369a.6\]]pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/
[\[369a.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[369b.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[379b.1\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar

[\[380a\]]

[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ste/_'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di 
[\[381a.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_

[\[381a.4\]]nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]go_/
[\[381a.5\]]rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/_/sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/_/lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa

[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/_/ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/_/reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/_/chos nyid rnam

[\[381b.4\]]pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[381b.5\]]nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_
[\[381b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams 
[\[381b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg

[\[382a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/

[\[382a.5\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[382a.6\]]ba'o/_/sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/_/chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nyid rnam

[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa
