[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[383a.2\]]nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[383a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[383a.4\]]pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/_/don dam 
[\[383a.5\]]pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa 
[\[383a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong 
[\[383a.7\]]pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad 
[\[383b.2\]]mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa 
[\[383b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po 
[\[383b.4\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/
[\[383b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[383b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[383b.7\]]kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]rnams so/_/tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[384a.2\]]'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[384a.3\]]par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smyon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams 
[\[384a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[384a.5\]]nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 
[\[384a.6\]]mi 'jigs pa rnams so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa 
[\[384a.7\]]chen po'o/_/snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//_//_
